Name: gluten allergy
Definition: A food allergy to wheat that is characterized by stomach cramping

Name: shellfish allergy
Definition: A food allergy triggered by Crustacea or Mollusca.

Name: fruit allergy
Definition: A food allergy triggered by a plant fruit product.

Name: fish allergy
Definition: A food allergy triggered by fish.

Name: wheat allergy
Definition: A food allergy that develops_from exposure to and particularly consumption of wheat

Name: milk allergy
Definition: A food allergy that results in adverse immune reaction to one or more of the proteins in cow's milk and/or the milk of other animals

Name: egg allergy
Definition: A food allergy that is an allergy or hypersensitivity to dietary substances from the yolk or whites of eggs

Name: nut allergy
Definition: A food allergy that develops_from exposure to and particularly consumption of nuts
